welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ukunda, Kenya! Known for its stunning beaches and vibrant local culture, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the charm this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ukunda Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ukunda Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Moi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bamburi Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bamburi Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, free for all passengers.
